website_summaries.verdict: If keto supplements are stretching the budget, here’s a lower cost, vegetarian-friendly option that gets high marks for increasing energy and hormone levels.
pros: Older males feel a boost in not only mental clarity but also testosterone
Easier on the stomach than taking just DHEA
Mood swings and appetite even out after a few days
cons: Be aware of possible side effects before purchase, which include increased estrogen, acne, and irritability

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Gives you a tad of energy. I've had better. Was a bit disappointed as I love this company and I use many of their other superior products.
customer_reviews.author: Clairebear

customer_reviews.title: a waste..not waist
customer_reviews.text: Being homebound for 11 weeks, because of covid19, without my exercise routine, put excess weight on me..which I am desperate to lose...so far ,in one month, I lost 30 days and $30..I was really controlling my food intake and exercising (which I do all the time anyway). I am very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Morgenstern

customer_reviews.title: It helps loose weight.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow, but the pill itself smells a little funny.
customer_reviews.author: Glory

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to order this product
customer_reviews.text: I feel this product gives me energy and helps with my cravings under control,without making me feel different or speedy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Serelis

customer_reviews.title: I have been taking this for about a month now ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for about a month now and I have noticed no changes. I weight the same and have no energy. It might just take a while before I notice anything so I will continue to take it for now.
customer_reviews.author: Marie M.

customer_reviews.title: The energy they are talking about....
customer_reviews.text: I feel that energy they are talking about. I was already taking DHEA but this is like the turbo DHEA! I take it on an empty stomach first thing when I get up with a glass of water. It's working great. I am so happy! Then I don't let anything in my stomach for about an hour and that's when I take the Cognitex that is helping so much with my memory. Really happy with these Life Extension products. Especially the Pytoceramides. They are erasing my wrinkles and plumping my skin. I look younger and more radiant!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Life Extension 7- Keto DHEA Metabolite
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this as directed for 1 month, and as far as I know it has not worked to speed up my metabolism.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hisaw

customer_reviews.title: No noticeable weight loss
customer_reviews.text: This supplement does appear to have actually increased my thyroid activity. I take a prescription natural thyroid hormone replacement for hypothyroidism, so I have my thyroid levels checked at least annually and, while taking 7-keto DHEA, my TSH came back low (meaning my thyroid gland was working overtime and possibly overproducing thyroid hormones). You would expect, then, great weight loss, but this has not been the case. I haven't lost any weight in the over 2 months I've been taking this despite maintaining a consistent diet and exercise program. Maybe it's just me, I don't know, but I figured I should for sure have lost at least a couple of lbs.
customer_reviews.author: ASPCAluvr

customer_reviews.title: lost 6 pounds in a month!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 55 year old woman. Despite months of exercise, clean healthy eating, thyroid medicine and bioidentical hormones I was unable to lose a pound. I added this product, 100 milligrams twice a day for one month and I have lost 6 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: KnS

customer_reviews.title: Starting to make me sick.
customer_reviews.text: If I take two pills a day at 100mg, it makes me sick. I would suggest taking 2x the 25 mg. If you weigh 170 pounds or less.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Gibson

customer_reviews.title: This helps with my thyroid. I am normally very ...
customer_reviews.text: This helps with my thyroid. I am normally very cold(fingers and toes). But, now I'm feeling very warm and improves my mood. I take as directed on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Peanut Butter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I normally have to pay $40 for these at my Drs office. These are the exact ingredients & dosage
customer_reviews.author: R-H-Burf

customer_reviews.title: Use regularly
customer_reviews.text: My homeopathic doctor recommended these pill to balance out my hormones. I use and buy it regularly. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: Blood levels of DHEA plummeted when using this brand
customer_reviews.text: When using this brand alone, my DHEA levels plummeted on my blood results. Won't buy this brand again. Think I'll go back to using regular DHEA at 25 mg and another brand of the keto to see if things improve.
customer_reviews.author: Queequeg

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Great Service and a great price! I order this on a regular basics and it is great has helped me a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Was not good for me
customer_reviews.text: This product is supposed ot help with weight loss and reduce stomach, however, this made my stomach upset, gave me headaches, my lip broke out and it made me very nervouse. I did not care for it.
customer_reviews.author: hinney44

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Best brand of 7 Keto I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

product_meta.title: Life Extension 7-Keto DHEA Metabolite 100 mg, 60 Vegetarian Capsules
product_meta.description: 7-Keto DHEA is the brand name for a natural metabolite of DHEA, your body's most abundant circulating hormone. 7-Keto DHEA has been shown to safely promote thermogenesis, the process of producing cellular energy in the form of heat. This formula also contains antioxidant extracts from curcumin, green tea, Japanese knotweed, and whole red grapes because of the effect 7-Keto has in boosting mitochondrial oxidation.
feature_bullets: Contains antioxidant extracts to counter oxidative stress
7-Keto DHEA Metabolite is an excellent choice
